Projects.name: Dijkstra Pathfinding Variant in Pygame
Projects.desc: Dijkstra implementation on a square grid, with the directed graph generalized to all incoming path weights to a node being the same for that node.

Projects.name: Spotify Pygame
Projects.desc: A spotify song displayer using spotipy with pygame, with customizable options.

Projects.name: RPGMaker clone (Grid Movement Demo)
Projects.desc: An basic functioning rpgmaker clone with a title screen/menu and basic grid movement using lerp. Move with arrow keys, confirm with z (only new game interacts with this currently). Currenly not designed with mobile devices in mind.
